channel.title: Laime Pilnīga on Latvian songs ABC notation
channel.description: Recent content in Laime Pilnīga on Latvian songs ABC notation

item.title: Kopā Brīvi
item.description: Acīs savāds spēks kā strāva mūs uz gaismu tur Sejās neizdzēšams smaids cauri laikiem bur Laikos dīvainos, kad neizprotams liekas viss Skatiens, smaids ir viss, kas mums vēl ir palicis Kopā brīvi Gaišas cerības kā nebeidzama upe plūst Seni sapņi mums par īstenību kļūst Laikos dīvainos, kad neizprotams liekas viss Sapņi cerības ir viss, kas mums atlicis Kopā brīvi Mūžam dzīvi

item.title: Awe
item.description: I remember when The dream was over I felt kinda sad And now I feel so odd I need to get there back now Oh, I got a secret to hold on to Oh, lookin’ for place to hide from you I went to my childhood place Climbed in my favourite tree in black and white Saw my beloved ones watchin’ Jim and Kurt Playin’ badminton and both them won I felt uplifted and so I flew Over the hills and the morning dew I felt so alive long ago Don’t know where I’m going but I have to go Oh, I got a secret to hold on to Oh, looking for place to hide from you Oh, I got a secret to hold on to Oh, looking for place to hide from you Ah, I got a secret Ah, I got a secret to hold Ooh, ooh Ooh, ooh, I got a secret I got a secret to hold
